You have been accepted as a poster presenter at ISCB46 - congratulations! In this document we summarize answers to some common questions and further instructions.

# Poster presentations

- Panels for poster presenters will be available.
- Poster should be the usual standard format (there is no template available or required), portrait format (we can cater up to A0, but no landscape format).
- Pins will be available.

# FAQs

For more general questions please refer to the [FAQs](faq.html).
